title: The epic rundown of Galaxy innovations - GhanaWeb
summary: Samsung's new Galaxy S23 series is made with more recycled materials than ever before, including recycled aluminum, glass, and PET, in addition to repurposed ocean-bound plastic. The Galaxy S23 series also features a number of new green innovations, such as an improved 12MP front camera for all three models that enables users to enjoy a bright and clear selfie experience, even in low light. The Galaxy S23 series is also more energy-efficient than previous models, thanks to a new Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 Mobile Platform for Galaxy.
